DOC.brief_summary: A randomized clinical trial involve 32 individual submit partial menisectomy conduct . Participants randomize : Group I , submit muscular rehabilitation program base eccentric isokinetic exercise ; Group II , submit muscular rehabilitation program base eccentric isotonic exercise . Concomitantly muscular rehabilitation protocol , individual undergo physiotherapeutic protocol analgesia , edema reduction , range motion , proprioception functionality goal . Muscle rehabilitation program base eccentric isotonic isokinetic exercise begin 15 day partial menisectomy . The program last six week , train frequency two session per week , separate minimum interval 72 hour .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Rehabilitation Programs Based Eccentric Exercise Knee Extensor Muscles Isotonic Isokinetic Conditions After Partial Menisectomy
DOC.criteria: Young adult age 18 40 year ; Recreational athletes ; Unilateral partial meniscal tear ; Partial meniscectomy videoarthroscopy within 90 day injury ; Male subject ; Classification body mass index preobese ( 25.0 29.9 kg / m2 ) ; Not undergoing strength training program lower limbs six month prior study ; Acceptance individual participate procedure propose research . Repeated meniscal tear ; Associated ligament injury ; Previous history ( < 6 month ) musculoskeletal lesion thigh ; Patellar tendinopathy ; Patellofemoral pain syndrome ; Respiratory cardiovascular condition limit performance exercise ; Users dietary supplement anabolic steroid
